subject: Basketball
Fines (Penalties)
Prudential Center (Newark)
lead_paragraph: New Jersey’s new governor, Christopher J. Christie, wants the Nets to pay a $7.5 million penalty if the team breaks its moves to the Prudential Center in Newark next season.
snippet: New Jersey’s new governor, Christopher J. Christie, wants the Nets to pay a $7.5 million penalty if the team breaks its moves to the Prudential Center in Newark next season.
